text: Unam vicom kujha loka ajihe vi hana jihare apani jibha nu kitaba parhade ho'e (sabadam da ucarana karana vica) marorade hana tam ki tusim usa nu kitaba vicom samajhom. Halanki uha kitaba vicom nahim. Uha kahide hana ki iha alaha de valom hai. Halanki iha alaha de valom nahim. Ate uha jana bujha ke alaha upara jhutha laga'unde hana
